Option-1:
Option-2:
start Slider JS
start builder section
start container
start column
ABOUT
Celebrate Your Leisure Years at Sweetwater Oaks 55+ Retirement Community in Ocala, FL
Sweetwater Oaks is a peaceful 55+ manufactured home community, spread across 45 acres with 242 beautifully maintained homes in the heart of Ocala, Marion County, Florida. Whether you’re looking for a tranquil place to relax or an active, social lifestyle, Sweetwater Oaks offers the ideal setting to enjoy your leisure years.
We invite you to connect with neighbors and enjoy a wide variety of on-site amenities and social events. Nestled in the natural beauty of Ocala, you’ll be surrounded by nearby state parks and world-class equestrian facilities. Known as the “Horse Capital of the World”, Ocala is home to over 400 thoroughbred training centers and hosts prestigious horse shows throughout the year.
end column
end container
end section
Option-1:
Option-2:
start Slider JS
start builder section
start container
start column
end column
end container
start column
Sweetwater Oaks’ Convenient Location in Ocala, FL
Located on 44th Avenue, Sweetwater Oaks provides easy access to US 27, a major east-west route. You’ll find nearby comfort food eateries, major retailers like Publix and Walgreens, and essential services such as banks, all just a short drive away.
Sweetwater is a desirable residence located on 44th Avenue which is a frontage road that connects to US 27. It is a major East/West, four-lane thoroughfare that contains many comfort food eateries along with major banks and retailers, including Publix and Walgreens.
end column
end container
end section
Option-1:
Option-2:
start Slider JS
start builder section
start container
start column
Become of Resident of Sweetwater Oaks in Ocala, FL
Join our vibrant 55+ community at Sweetwater Oaks, where you’ll enjoy beautifully maintained homes, a range of on-site amenities, and a welcoming environment. Our residents love the peaceful, active lifestyle surrounded by Ocala’s natural beauty and the convenience of nearby shopping, dining, and recreation. Experience the perfect blend of comfort, community, and affordability at Sweetwater Oaks.
Manufactured Homes for Sale in Ocala, Florida
Explore our selection of manufactured and mobile homes for sale in Ocala, Florida at Sweetwater Oaks. Our homes are designed for comfort and convenience, with various layouts to fit your lifestyle, all within a thriving 55+ community. Browse our current listings to find your perfect home in this peaceful and vibrant setting.
Available listings
end column
end container
start column
end column
end container

Contact Us
